# something like this can be copy and pasted into the terminal: 

for subject in nd150921 zl150930 ps151001 dw151003 aa151010 al151016 ag151024 jv151030 sr151031 vm151031 si151120 jg151121 wr151127 ja151218 tm160117 kl160122 as160129 wh160130 ss160205 rp160205 bp160213 cs160214 nb160221 rf160313 jw160316 pk160319 jc160320 jc160321 jn160403 rb160407 rv160413 ac160415 jr160507 yl160507 cm160510 mp160511 tj160529 at160601 zm160627 jh160702 jf160703 cg160715 rs160730 nc160905 lm160914 kn160918 ld160918 li160927 jb161004 rc161007 se161021 mr161024 gm161101 hw161104 ph161104 kd170115 er170121 al170316 jd170330 jw170330 tg170423 jc170501 rl170603 rf170610 dd170610 mr170621 ds170728 as170730 rc170730 rt170816 vb170914 ds170915 ts170927 cs171002 er171009 tl180126;  do scp $subject/dti96trilin/bin/md_tlrc.nii.gz span@vta.stanford.edu:~/lvta/cuesvm/$subject/; done
